title: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation
brief_description: A refresher course for people with First Aid training on cardiopulmonary resuscitation. An excellent resource for Occupational Health and Safety Officers which demonstrates in clear and concise steps, the correct procedures for cardiopulmonary resuscitation on an adult. There is a simulated workplace accident which highlights the importance of following correct procedures. Many of the techniques are demonstrated by the use of a resuscitation dummy.
